Name: Grainfruit Wrap
Desc: A main dish wrapped in big leaves. There's a simple saying in Natlan that goes like this: "When you're looking for a leaf to wrap up your Grainfruit, a leaf will always fall." It's used to express the idea that if things are meant to happen, they will.
Effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 107 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
